item.title: Simple Varnish Config
item.description: Config is an exact copy of https://gist.github.com/jeremyjbowers/1542949. Copying it here verbatim to avoid bit rot. /* * * First, set up a backend to answer the request if there's not a cache hit. * */ backend default { # Set a host. .host = "192.168.1.100"; # Set a port. 80 is normal Web traffic. .port = "8000"; } /* * * Next, configure the "receive" subroutine. * */ sub vcl_recv { # Use the backend we set up above to answer the request if it's not cached.
